Develop an umbrella with a built-in GPS tracker to help people locate their lost umbrellas.
Design an umbrella with a built-in fan to provide a cooling breeze on hot days.
Create an umbrella with a built-in water filtration system to provide clean drinking water in areas with contaminated water sources.
Develop an umbrella with a built-in LED light to provide visibility during nighttime use.
Design an umbrella with a built-in air purifier to help people breathe clean air in polluted areas.
